titles: A joviall crew, or, The merry beggars presented in a comedie at Drury-Lane, in the yeer 1641 / written by Richard Brome.
author: Brome, Richard, d. 1652?
publisher: Printed by J.Y. for E.D. and N.E.,
notes: "Last play acted before Parliament closed the theatres in 1642."  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
One of the commendatory poems prefixed, signed: Jo. Tatham, contains a reference to Shakespeare.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
